text:
I've been fixing some bugs in the state-machine node-type in my visual programming system "code-flow-canvas" and also added a small media-library node-type which can be used by the show-image node-type.
The show-image node-type can be controlled by the state-machine together with some UI node-types (button and slider).
The show-image node-type also has an ability to change it's css and use flow parameters/variables (currently only the incoming value of a event/value special input-type.. I want to make this more generic in the near future so that you can send custom property-bags "over the wire" to other nodes).

The timeline slider doesn't work together nicely with the slider node-type yet, so I have to work on that further.

This example can be found on <https://demo.codeflowcanvas.io> in the "examples" drop down: "Simple state machine with image and brightness". Video can be seen here : <https://youtu.be/3t6XUXdFMZU>

attachments.video_html: <iframe width="400" height="225" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/3t6XUXdFMZU?feature=oembed&autoplay=1&iv_load_policy=3" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen title="Simple state machine with value slider for brightness control and image in code-flow-canvas"></iframe>
attachments.fallback: YouTube Video: Simple state machine with value slider for brightness control and image in code-flow-canvas
attachments.title: Simple state machine with value slider for brightness control and image in code-flow-canvas
